author: mpo
msg: Let Timetolive for Apples be controlled by the default timetolive of the ContinuationsManagerImpl

author: cziegeler
msg: Moved scratchpad into an own block. This allows that code in the
scratchpad can depend on other blocks. The scratchpad can now also
Extended the build system. If one block depends on the other it
can now also use the libraries of the other block. This avoids
moving the libs to the lib/optional directory.

author: cziegeler
msg: Now any protocol can be used as the documentURI

author: upayavira
msg: Returning log kit location to original behaviour, prior to a more thorough fix later.

author: cziegeler
msg: Moving to ServiceableGenerator and fixing many component releases!
